channel.title: Cloud Formation on Simon's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Formation on Simon's Portfolio

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: Introduction In this blog I aspire to detail my journey in adopting AWS Serverless Architecture; Amplify Lambda Cognito AppSync DynamoDB API Gateway I am creating a Competition Management App for event organizers and competitors at Singapore Wakepark. This is a full stack serverless web application (ReactJS front-end, GraphQL API (AppSync + Node JS Lambda) back-end. I chose these technologies for the job because I believe them to be a good fit to my needs;
